bug.author: typhoonzero
bug.summary: xgboost model training fails in playground
bug.description:
env: <denchmark-link:http://47.114.161.156:8000/>http://47.114.161.156:8000/</denchmark-link>
file: housing-explain.ipynb <denchmark-code>%%sqlflow SELECT * FROM boston.train TO TRAIN xgboost.gbtree WITH objective="reg:squarederror", train.num_boost_round = 30 COLUMN crim, zn, indus, chas, nox, rm, age, dis, rad, tax, ptratio, b, lstat LABEL medv INTO sqlflow_models.my_xgb_regression_model; </denchmark-code>
